title: Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When setting the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report displays the same results.
EB:
I expected different results based on the chosen content type: 

1. For Plain, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed.
2. For Auto, I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
3. For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.

However, the attached report shows the same results regardless of the chosen content type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the attached report.
2. Locate the dynamic text element.
3. Set the Content Type property to Plain and observe the displayed results.
4. Set the Content Type property to Auto and observe the displayed results.
5. Set the Content Type property to HTML and observe the displayed results.
